pattern.title: Complex type with simple content has `structures:SimpleObjectAttributeGroup`

rule.context: xs:simpleContent/xs:extension[ some $base-qname in resolve-QName(@base, .) satisfies namespace-uri-from-QName($base-qname) = xs:anyURI('http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema') or ends-with(local-name-from-QName($base-qname), 'SimpleType')]
rule.assert: Rule 9-36: A complex type definition with simple content MUST include structures:SimpleObjectAttributeGroup.
